fields.Name: Locket of the Iron Solari
fields.Description: +400 Health +100% Base Health Regen +20 Magic Resist +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Active: Grants a shield to nearby allies for 2 seconds that absorbs up to 75 (+15 per level) damage (60 second cooldown). UNIQUE Aura - Legion: Grants nearby allies +15 Magic Resist. (Unique Auras with the same name don't stack.)
